content: Hello Mister Heine, thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Nesibe Trabelsi

content: Mister Heine, thank you for considering me for the rental of your apartment. I am particularly interested in the rental price, as it is an important factor for me. May I know what you are proposing?
name: Nesibe Trabelsi

content: I am proposing 1200 Euros per month, which I believe is a fair and reasonable price for the size and location of the apartment. What do you think?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Thank you for sharing your proposal, Mister Heine. I appreciate the effort you have put into considering my needs. However, I must admit that I was expecting a lower rental price for a 25 square meter apartment. I would need to consider this proposal further and see if it is within my budget. May I ask if there is any flexibility on your part in terms of the rental price?
name: Nesibe Trabelsi

content:
I am willing to negotiate. What are you looking for?

I understand that the apartment is in the heart of the city and close to public transportation, which makes it a convenient location. Additionally, it is in a safe neighborhood with easy access to shopping and dining options. The apartment has been well-maintained and is in good condition. It has a nice view of the city, which I think would be an added value. However, I am willing to consider any feedback or suggestions you may have in order to reach an agreement that is mutually beneficial.
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Thank you for your willingness to negotiate, Mister Heine. I understand the features of the apartment and I appreciate the care that has been taken to maintain it. However, I am looking for a rental price that is lower than 1200 Euros per month. I believe that my budget allows for a more affordable option. Would you be open to discussing a lower rental price?
name: Nesibe Trabelsi
